app.title: PDFcow: PDF Editor
app.subtitle: Merge, split, rotate, organize, and secure your documents — all completely free. No uploads, no subscriptions, just powerful PDF tools running natively on your Mac.

encrypt_pdf.empty_subtitle: Drop a PDF here or click to browse

decrypt_pdf.empty_subtitle: Drop an encrypted PDF here or click to browse
